title: Creditors' haircuts in bankruptcy cases jump to 73 pc in FY24, resolutions taking longer: Report
description: Creditors' haircuts in bankruptcy resolutions rose to 73% in FY24 from 64% in FY23. 269 resolution plans were approved by NCLTs, with a decline in new admissions due to Covid-19. The average resolution time also increased, impacting CIRPs and entities. NCLT passed liquidation orders for 446 corporate debtors in FY24.
